fixes.name: CAal date
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced the Tableau parameter reference [Parameters].[Enter The Date ] with the required DAX parameter pattern SELECTEDVALUE('Enter The Date '[Display As]). TODAY() remains as-is. The expression evaluates to a boolean, so the DAX measure returns TRUE/FALSE.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
